metadata.title: Thursday, 26th June, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) how many interns were engaged by the Government at Kanyama Level I Hospital in Kanyama Parliamentary Constituency, under the Internship Programme from 2021 to 2024, year by year; and
(b) of the interns above, how many had been employed by the Government during the same period, year by year.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) when the Government will reconstruct the bridge across Mbaswa Stream, connecting the Mbaswa and Makopa Settlements in Serenje District;
(b) what the cost of the reconstruction is; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the works is.

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning
parts: (a) what measures the Government is taking to arrest the rise in inflation in the economy; and
(b) what factors contribute to the rise in prices of essential commodities.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify Chimowa and surrounding areas in Pemba District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) how many of the following institutions of higher learning there were, countrywide, as of June, 2024:
(i) public universities; (ii) private universities; (iii) public colleges; and (iv) private colleges;
(b) how often the Higher Education Authority conducts assessments of the learning institutions at (a); and
(c) what criteria are used to ensure quality education is provided.
